name: Dracus Renga - Demo
description:
Think of a Scrolling Shooter with DRAGONS! Add Adventure and RPG elements to it, like Skill Development and Quests. Blend it all together and that's Renga!

We are aiming at doing something different. It's not only a Scrolling Shooter like everything else in the market, but something fun and captivating.

You can follow us and check the game's progress at the social networks.

Here, you can download our DEMO version - what we've got so far. We are really looking forward to receive feedback! Please, contact us.

Follow US:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dracusteamoficial/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dracusteam/

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPCLxeuSG-GlcNh8wBlmyoA/
